list_definition.definition: a piece of any of several types of absorbent cloth or paper for drying oneself, dishes etc after washing etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: After her swim, she dried herself with a towel
a roll of paper kitchen towels.
She was busy toweling herself dry.

list_ex_of_english: I would certainly wish him a series of very cool wet towels to wrap round his head when he is doing this series of sums.
I have to cover my face with paper towels and run through to my office.
There are questions such as the sizing of blankets and towels and sheets.
The number of coupons needed for towels has just been halved in order to allow more for everybody.
I am having inquiries made about the suggestion that medium and large sized towels are more difficult to obtain than the smaller ones.
The provision made here is for clean towels and soap.
Their families would have to bring in the grub and possibly towels, soap and everthing else.
Is this company going to get its towels?
